#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int a[1<<8][1<<8];

int main()
{
    int n;
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            a[i][j] = s[j];
            if (s[j] == '-') {
                a[i][j] = (1<<20);
                continue;
            }
            if (a[i][j] >= 'a') {
                a[i][j] = a[i][j] - 87;
            } else if (a[i][j] >= 'A') {
                a[i][j] = a[i][j] - 29;
            } else {
                a[i][j] = a[i][j] - 48;
            }
        }
    }

    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            for (int k = 0; k < n; k++) {
                if (a[j][i] + a[i][k] < a[j][k]) {
		   if (j == k) continue;
                    a[j][k] = a[j][i] + a[i][k];
                }
            }
        }
    }
    int mx = -1;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
            if (i == j) {
                continue;
            }
            mx = max(a[i][j], mx);
        }
    }
    if (mx < (1<<20)) {
        cout << mx << endl;
    } else {
        cout << "-1" << endl;
    }
}
    return 0;
}
